website_summaries.verdict: A heavy cruiser, not a BMX stunt bike or sprinter. Younger children may find it difficult to pedal, but older riders will enjoy its impressive design and all-terrain performance.
pros: Heavy duty construction, will handle difficult terrain
Assembly only requires one Allen wrench
cons: May not arrive with assembly instructions
Some critical parts are plastic, not metal
Very heavy, challenging for younger riders on steep terrain

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a Bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday present for a 9 year old boy. Arrived intact, and damage-free. Went together flawlessly, but required adjustment of the derailleur cable (after normal break-in / cable stretch). Also, the disc brake pads / calipers required adjustment, so good thing I worked in a bike shop for 5 years. For the average Dad, this might prove to be frustrating. A local bike shop could adjust everything for you for a fee, but might cost a bit because you didn't but it from them. The bike is heavy, but it rolls over everything. it's a beast! Very well-constructed, and very sturdy. Should last for years to come with shelter and proper maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain in the butt to assemble. Gears don’t shift fluidly. Son likes riding it though. If I could do a again I would spend more money for a higher quality bike.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging, lady ups had suggested to return package ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor packaging, lady ups had suggested to return package since it opened when she carried it out of the truck. I opted to received the product but parts are misaligned especially the derail shift device, wheels and bearing are hard to turn, brake disc catching on the brake pads due to bad wheel balance. Do not recommend at all. It really looks nice but not worth the money. My kid was very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic gear in derailleur snapped on use #2!
customer_reviews.text: The bike looks great! It looks the part! However, it does not perform the way it looks. The derailleur comes with plastic gears. We bought this for my 9 year old for Christmas. He rode it twice before the deraillear gear snapped, bent and sheared off the brake attachment. In putting it together, my husband aside that the derailleur gauged into the tire and he had to bend it out some. We will likely return it. My son is so upset!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Plastic gear derailer broke in a few months!
customer_reviews.text: The bike worked okay for a few months with some minor gear issues from day one. We reached the 6-month point and the plastic gear derailer snapped and bent into the rear wheel. The bike is unusable at this point. I saw by doing an online search of issues with this bike and some reviewers here that this plastic derailer breaking is a common problem. I'm glad that I purchased the warranty. This piece of garbage is going back for a refund and I don't plan on getting a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gerrard

customer_reviews.title: Quality bike.

product_meta.title: Mongoose Kong Fat Tire Mountain Bike for Kids, 20-Inch Wheels
product_meta.description: The Mongoose Massif 20" beach cruiser is designed to be ridden easily on a wide variety of terrain thanks to oversized tires for stability & traction. Cruiser frame geometry adds a comfortable but athletic riding position. The Massif is equipped with a supersized beach frame with plenty of clearance to conquer any terrain with the 4 1/4" knobby tires to 4 1/4" tires. Alloy 4" wide wheel set with disc brakes for easy stopping, low rise handlebars for comfort and stability and 3 piece cranks, the 7 speed gearing make this the perfect bike to go conquer anything.
feature_bullets: Mongoose Supersized beach cruiser 4 1/4" knobby tires to 4 1/4" tires.
Cruiser design frame with plenty of clearance to conquer any terrain
Alloy 4" wide wheel set with disc brakes
7 speed gearing with Shimano rear derailleur
3 piece cranks and beach cruiser pedals
